Name: Bangkok Metropolitan Region
Description: The capital and largest city of Thailand, a bustling metropolis known for its vibrant street life, cultural landmarks, and traffic.

Name: Chiang Mai
Description: A city in northern Thailand known for its temples, mountainous scenery, and as a cultural hub of the region.

Name: Phuket
Description: A famous island destination known for its beautiful beaches, luxury resorts, and vibrant nightlife.

Name: Chonburi
Description: A province located on the Gulf of Thailand, home to Pattaya, a popular beach city and tourist destination.

Name: Khon Kaen
Description: Located in northeastern Thailand, known for its universities, temples, and regional economic importance.

Name: Nakhon Ratchasima
Description: A large province in northeastern Thailand, known as Korat, with a blend of history, agriculture, and natural beauty.

Name: Ayutthaya
Description: A historical city and former capital of Siam, known for its ancient temples and ruins, now a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

Name: Udon Thani
Description: A major city in northeastern Thailand, an important center for trade, agriculture, and tourism.

Name: Songkhla
Description: Located in southern Thailand, Songkhla is known for its beaches, lakes, and as a center of commerce and trade.
